edu.illinois.mitra.starl.interfaces

Class StarLCallable

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.illinois.mitra.starl.interfaces.StarLCallable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.util.List<java.lang.Object>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BullyLeaderElection, LogicThread, PickedLeaderElection

    public abstract class StarLCallable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.util.List<java.lang.Object>>
    StarLCallable is a base class for all Callable classes intended for use in StarL. In a simulation environment, StarLCallable handles registering the created thread with the simulator engine upon calling call(), and removes the registration when the call completes. All StarLCallables return a list of Objects, making it easy to return a large number of different objects. The protected Object[] results variable is provided, along with a method returnResults(), to easily manage the objects to be returned.
